Welcome to stackit's documentation!
====================================

stackit is a macOS menu bar application framework using StackMenuItem for rich layouts.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   quickstart
   api/index
   examples

Overview
--------

stackit provides an isolated framework for creating macOS status bar applications with rich, custom layouts using Python.

Features
--------

* Rich layouts with hstack/vstack (like SwiftUI)
* Extensive UI controls (labels, buttons, sliders, progress bars, etc.)
* SF Symbols support with full customization
* Text input fields (regular, secure, search)
* Date and time pickers
* Checkbox, radio buttons, and combo boxes
* Built on PyObjC for native macOS integration
